name: Multifactorial Geriatric Cachexia Syndrome
chief_complaint: I've lost so much weight without trying and I feel weaker every day
prognosis: Guarded - 50% 1-year mortality without aggressive intervention. Potential for partial functional recovery with 6-12 month multidisciplinary approach.
description: A complex wasting disorder in elderly patients involving chronic inflammatory state, anabolic resistance, and neuroendocrine dysregulation distinct from simple malnutrition or cancer cachexia. Characterized by disproportionate muscle loss relative to fat loss and resistance to conventional nutritional support.
